content.rendered: Wireless Module LMBT-1T01 is a single board solution with Bluetooth classic and Low energy dual mode 4.0. LMBT-1T01 Provides Bluetooth SPP (Serial Port Profile) function, GATT (Generic Attribute Profile) function, and LE (Low Energy) function specified in Bluetooth™ Specifications. It is controlled by an external MCU using UART interface.

excerpt.rendered:
• Bluetooth Classic & Low energy duel mode 4.0
  • High Sensitivity (-88dBm typ.)
  • Internal Crystal Oscillator (26 Mhz)
  • Fast Connection Setup
  • UART Interface
